    • handlePlayedGame

      void handlePlayedGame(User user, Game game)
      Adds or removes a game from the list of played games of a user If it is removed as played, it is also removed as liked
      Parameters:
      user - the current user
      game - the selected game

    • handleLikedGame

      void handleLikedGame(User user, Game game)
      Adds or removes a game from the list of liked games of a user If it is added as liked, it is also added as played
      Parameters:
      user - the current user
      game - the selected game
